titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent from VVilliam Lavd, Archbishop of Canterbury, the 28 of June, MDCXLI, unto the Universitie of Oxford specifying his willingnesse to resigne his chancellor-ship, and withall deploring his sad estate now in the time of his imprisonship.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

notesStmt.note: A forgery of Laud's original letter. Not printed at Oxford.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
